articles.author: Shehan Jeyarajah
articles.title: Indiana earns first national championship, completing perfect season in CFP title game thriller over Miami - CBS Sports
articles.description: The Hoosiers completed one of college football's most improbable rises with a signature performance in the College Football Playoff National Championship against Miami
articles.content:
FINAL: Indiana 27, Miami 21
MIAMI GARDENS, Florida -- No. 1 Indiana used a legendary run from Heisman quarterback Fernando Mendoza to blow past No. 10 Miami 27-21 and win the first national champion… [+1867 chars]

articles.title: Hoosier fans pack Bloomington bars to watch CFP national championship - IndyStar
articles.description: Indiana Hoosiers fans take in the CFP national championship Monday, Jan. 19, 2026, from venues in Bloomington.
articles.content:
